Kumbululo lia mu Mbimbiliya
Ka. Mbimbiliya yakwamba ngwo twatamba kulemba wika kuli Zambi, mu jina lia Yesu. Yesu kalwezele tumbaji twenyi ngwenyi: “Kashika lembenu ngwenu, Tata nuli mu malilu, jina lienu lipwe lisandu.” (Mateu 6:9) Iye kakalongesele ngwenyi tumbaji twenyi te katamba kulemba kuli asandu, kuli angelo hanji kuli tuzambi akwo. Alioze kuli Zambi wika.
Yesu kambile nawa kuli tumbaji twenyi ngwenyi: “Ye jila yami, ni we umwenemwene, ni we mwono. Niumwe meza kuli Tata shina ni yami.” (Yoano 14:6) Yesu wika mwe uli ni ulite wa kutumanyinako hanji ngwetu kutuhanjikilako kuli Yehova.—A-Hepreu 7:25.
Shina twatamba kulemba kuli Zambi ni kuli asandu?
Muze Satana esekele Yesu, Yesu yamukumbulula ngwenyi: “Ukawayile Mwene Zambi ye. Iye wika ukamulingile.” (Mateu 4:10) Zambi kakushimbwila tumuwayile wika iye, chino chinalumbunuka ngwo twatamba kulemba wika kuli iye.—Izaia 48:11.
Kulemba kuli chitangiwa cheswacho ngwe, asandu hanji angelo, chili kutuka Zambi. Muze postolo Yoano esekele kuwayila umwe mungelo, mungelo wacho yamulweza ngwenyi: “Kanda uchilinga! Yami nguli ndungo-ni-mukwenu, ni ndungo-ni-mukwo wa mandumbu je, waze ali ni shindakenyo ya Yesu. Wayila Zambi.”—Usolwelo 19:10.

1. Mumu liaka Zambi atangile hano hashi?
AMBI kanazange hanga hano hashi hapwe hapema. Yehova kanazange hashi hatwame atu a uwahililo, a mijimba yingunu. Mbimbiliya yinambe ngwo “Yehova Zambi yatumba munda ku chivumbuko, mu Endene” nawa “yasokesa mitondo . . . yeswe yipema ha kuyitala, ni yize yipema ya kulia.” Mba Zambi yatanga lunga ni pwo mutangu, Alama ni Eva, ni kwaasa mu munda
...

Muhasa kutayiza Yehova apwe Mwata we ni ku mukwasa hanga usolole ngwe Satana kali mukwa-mahuza. (Samu 73:28; tanga Yishima 27:11.) Alioze, atu akehe wika akulinga chocho mukachi ka tununu a tununu twa atu hano hashi. Chino chinaneha chihula chilemu chakwamba ngwo: Kutala chamwenemwene
...

24. Kuchi wanyonga hakutwala ku kutwama mu Paraisu hano hashi?
24 Chochene, wano makapwa mashimbu apema kuli waze analilongesa hakutwala kuli Sakatanga Munene, Yehova Zambi, ni kumuwayila! Yesu katongwele Paraisu yize muyiza hano hashi hakulakenya chingulungulu yoze wafwilile sali lienyi ngwenyi: “Kumukapwa hamwe ni yami mu Paraisu.” (Luka 23:43) Chili chilemu chinji kulilongesa hakutwala kuli Yesu Kristu, mumu muli iye mwe mutukatambwila yiwape yeswe ayi.

Shinganyekenu munakumona vatu vawana vanatwame hatuvalu twavo vaze vali nakulaha najishindo. Vyuma munakuhumikiza vinahase kumyanukisa mujimbu mweji kutanganga muMbimbiliya. Kavalu watete utoma, vanakumutambukisa kuli Mwangana wamuhya uze vanavwiki muchama. Kaha munyima yenyi muli kavalu uchila, vanakumutambukisa kuli mutu anakufumisa kuunda hamavu hosena. Kufumaho nakwiza kavalu wamuchitatu wilava, muka-kumutambukisa nakwate vipezaliso mulivoko lyenyi vize vinakulumbununa mujimbu wakukeha chavy

le woma chikuma omu ngwatangile mujimbu wavaka-kutambuka hatuvalu vawana. Ngwashinganyekele ngwami Likumbi Lyakusopesa linapandama chikuma, kaha hakuwana nge kangwapwile wakulizangako, ngocho ngwamwene ngwami kangweshi kuyovokako.”
Ed ambile ngwenyi: “Ngwalikomokelele chikuma hali ava vaka-kutambuka hatuvalu vawana. Omu ngwatachikijile jino kanawa ulumbunwiso wechi chakumwenesa, ngwamwene kulema chamujimbu kana.”

unga atulweza ngwenyi tunahase kupwa vakuwahilila kachi nge natutanganga, nakulinangula, nakukavangiza vyuma vyosena vize vasoneka mumukanda kanou waupolofweto.—Kusoloka 1:1-3.
Numba tuhu vatu vamwe veji kwivwanga woma hakutanga mujimbu kanou, oloze kavausonekele utwivwise womako. Tuyokutuyoku nawa vatu vavavulu vawana nge mujimbu kanou weji kujikijisanga lufwelelo lwavo nakutalilila vyuma vyamwaza vinakwiza kulutwe. Nayenu munahase kwivwa mwomumwe. Tunamilombo mutange chihande chinakavangizaho.

Uno uli nakumona ava malunga vali hamuvwimbimbi tahi?— Majinavo vakiko Mateu, Mako, Luka, Yowano, Petulu, Yakova, Yuta naPaulu. Vosena kuvapwile omu Yesu apwile hano hamavu, kaha vasonekele mujimbu wakuyoya chaYesu. Tutale jino vyuma valingile ava malunga.
Uno wavatachikiza ava malunga tahi?
Hali ava malunga vosena, hapwile vatatu vaze vapwile vaposetolo vaze kakavulu vayilenga chikuma naYesu nakwambulula mujimbu wamwaza. Watachikiza majina ava vaposetolo vatatu tahi?— Vapwile Mateu, Yowano naPe

ga vakwavo nawa vatunangula mijimbu yaYesu yize yatwama mumikanda vasonekele. Lunga umwe tunakuvuluka hano shina Mako. Malunga vakwavo nawa vavali uli nakumona aha hamuvwimbimbi navakiko vasonekele mikanda yize yatwama muMbimbiliya. Vapwile vasongo jaYesu. Watachikiza majina avo tahi?— Vakiko vaYakova naYuta. Ha

Kumbululo lia mu Mbimbiliya
Yuma yakusolola ngwo Mikele lili jina lia Yesu mu malilu shimbu te kanda achiza hano hashi ni muze afunyine mu malilu. a Mayingeleja amwe kakumuvuluka ngwo “São Miguel.” Mbimbiliya yakwamba ngwo Mikele kalitachikile ni Satana hamukunda wa mujimba wa Mose. Chikwo nawa, kakwashile umwe mungelo kutwala sango kuli profeta Daniele. (Daniele 10:13, 21; Yundase 9) Jina Mikele linalumbunuka ‘Iya yoze walifwa ni Zambi?’ Iye katela kupwa ni jina lino mumu kakukalila unguvulu wa
... 
twe.
Mikele kakusongwela chilombo cha angelo. “Mikele ni angelo jenyi ashile jita ni ndragau,” hanji ngwetu Satana. (Usolwelo 12:7) Mikele kakwete wata unji mu malimu, mumu kakumuvuluka ngwo “umwe wa akwa lutwe hakachi ka akwa kuyula” ni “mukwa kuyula munene.” (Daniele 10:13, 21; 12:1) Umwe mukwa-kulilongesa Usendo Waha avuluka ngwo, David E. Aune yamba ngwenyi: “Yisanyiko yino yinasolola ngwo Mikele kali kasongo ka angelo mu malilu.”
Mbimbiliya yakutongola nawa jina lia mutu umuwika yoze ukwete
...
bi,” makalinga yuma yinji ngwe “MWANANGANA WA MIANANGANA ESWE,” hanga akanongese akwa-kole eswe a Zambi ni kufunga atu ja Zambi. (Usolwelo 19:11-16) Iye makachilinga ha “luyinda munene, yoze kanda amoneka hano hashi chize ku uputukilo wa hashi.”—Mateu 24:21, 42.

MU MBIMBILIYA ye, kuchi mukanda wa Samu 83:18 ausoneka? Mu Tradução do Novo Mundo das Escrituras Sagradas kanayisoneka chino: “Atu akanyingike ngwo yena wika uli ni jina lia Yehova, uli mwe Chitunda helu lia hashi heswe.” Mbimbiliya jinji nejo che ajisoneka. Alioze, akwa-kulumbununa anji kakuchizaho jina lia Yehova ni kusalakanyisaho yisanyiko ngwe “Mwene” hanji “Zambi.” Yika te atamba kusa mu versu ayi? Chisanyiko nyi jina Yehova?
Versu yino yakuhanjika hakutwala ku jina. Mu Hepreu, limi litang
... 
ya chili ha ndako yikulu ya A-Yunda. Anji a kuli A-Yunda te kakunyonga ngwo jina lia Zambi kuchatambile kulivuluka. Nyonga lino lipi lineza ha yimwe shimbi ya mu Mbimbiliya yize apwile ni kwamba ngwo: “Kanda ukavuluka ni mahuza jina lia Yehova Zambi ye, mumu Yehova kechi kusambisa yoze mavuluka ni mahuza jina lienyi.”—Kutuhuka 20:7.
Shimbi yino yakanjisa wika kuvuluka ni nyonga lipi jina lia Zambi. Shina yakanjisa nawa kulivuluka ni vumbi nyi? Ka. Mumu atu waze asonekene Mbimbiliya mu limi lia H
...
Yetweswe kutushi nawo. Muze mununga ni kulilongesa Mbimbiliya, mukomoka ha kumona chize Yehova akupwa cheswacho anazange hanga amanunune yilakenyo yenyi. Nawa kakuwahilila hakuzachisa ndundo jenyi hanga akwase waze amuzanga. (2 Sango ja Mianangana 16:9) Waze kanyingikine jina lienyi keshi kunyingika yitanga yipema ya utu wa Yehova.
Chochene, jina Yehova lili lia mu Mbimbiliya. Kunyingika ulumbunwiso walio ni kulivuluka ha kuwayila Zambi chakukwasa kukundama kuli Tata yetu wa mu malilu, Yehova. *

Munahase kulisuula nakuseza tanga yenu nalifuchi lyenu nakuya mulifuchi lyeka nakwambulula mujimbu wamwaza tahi? Makulukaji aVinjiho jaYehova vanalingi vene ngocho. Vanakwamba kafwe ngwavo, “Yami uno, ngutume ami.” (Isaya 6:8) Hakulinga ngocho vali nakulondezeza Yesu Kulishitu uze apwile Kamishonali wamunene.—Yowano 7:29.
Hijila yimwe yakulondezezelamo Yesu. Yesu vamutumine kuli Kalunga kufuma mwilu nakwiza nakutwama hamwe navaka-shili. Numba tuhu Yesu amwenenga vilinga vyavipi hano hamavu, oloz
... 
chakutalilaho chaYesu.
Valisuula muchiyoyelo chavo. Vamishonali vatela kwijilila chiyoyelo cheka, nachisemwa cheka najingonde jakulisezaseza, nakulya vyakulya vyeka vize kavejililako. Vatela nawa kulinangula lilimi lyakuchihela vali mangana valivwasanenga kanawa navatu vakungalila kana. Vatela kulisuula nawa nakuzachisa kala jila yakutambukilamo yize veji kuzachisanga vatu vakuchihela vali numba vahase kuheta nakuvihela vyatwama kwakusuku chikuma. Vamishonali vatela kupwa nazangi yamwenemwene ya
...
nangulanga kushikola kana vyeji kuvakafwanga vafwelele chikuma muli Yehova, namuMazu enyi, namuliuka lyenyi. (Vishimo 3:5, 6) Eyi shikola yeji kuvalingisanga vapwenga navilinga vyauKulishitu vize vyeji kuvakafwanga mumulimo wavo waumishonali nakupwa vaka-kunangula Mbimbiliya vakwipangweji. Ngocho veji kupwanga jino vakutamo kuya nakwambulwila “nakuvihela vyakwakusuku vyahamavu.”—Vilinga 1:8.
Vyuma muka vyasakiwa numba mutu apwenga kamishonali?

Yena unanyingika Wanangana wacho?— Ewa, uno uli Wanangana wa Zambi, uze muukapwisa hashi heswe paraisu. Yena unazange kulilongesa nawa hakutwala ku Wanangana wacho?—

Yika yena unashimbwila mu Paraisu?
Yetwe mutukawahilila chinji! Mu Paraisu, atu kechi kalilamba chipwe kuliasa jita umwe ni mukwo. Atu eswe makapwa ni zango kuli umwe ni mukwo. Niumwe makayiza hanji kufwa wakwihi. Tupuputa kumakamona, tujika matwi kumakevwa, nawa waze keshi kuhasa kwenda kumakenda ni kutumbwoka. Atu eswe makapwa ni yakulia yinji. Nawa tushitu eswe makapwa masepa umwe ni mukwo ni kuli atu. Atu waze hanafu kumakaahindwisa. Malunga ni mapwo waze yena walilongesa ha kamukanda kano, ngwe Rebeka, Rahape, Ndawichi ni Eliya, kumakaahindwisa hanga akatwame nawa ni mwono! Yena unazange kuliwana ni atu wano muze makaahindwisa?—
Yehova kakukuzanga nawa iye kanazange hanga yena uwahilile. Nyi wanunga ni kulilongesa hakutwala kuli Yehova ni kumwononokena, yena muukapwa ni uhashi wa kutwama ni mwono wa miaka yeswe hano hashi mu yimwe paraisu yipema! Che yena unazange?—

1. Mumu liaka umbachiso uli ulemu ha kuwahilila mu usoko?
Sango Jipema jineza kuli Yehova, Zambi wa uwahililo yoze unazange hanga asoko awahilile. (1 Timoteu 1:11) Iye mwe unakalinga umbachiso. Umbachiso wakusonekesa kuli akwa kuyula uli ni ulemu mumu wakuneha uwahililo ni ufunge upema kuli asoko, hanga afumbe kanawa ana.
Nyonga lika Zambi alinalio ha umbachiso? Iye kanazange ngwo umbachiso wa lunga ni pwo ununge ndo ha matangwa eswe. Akwa Kristu chatamba kuvumbika shimbi ja mu chifuchi cho haku
... 
atamba kulizanga ni kulivumbika umwe ni mukwo. Lunga ni pwo kali akwa shili, kashika chaatamba kulikonekena mumu ye fungula ya uwahililo mu umbachiso.
3. Umbachiso we ni unapinji chatamba kuliecha nyi?
Nyi yitanga yenu yinapinjisa umbachiso wenu, chanutamba kusa tachi hanga nulizange umwe ni mukwo. (1 A-Korindu 13:4, 5) Liji lia Zambi lishi kulongesa ngwo kulihandununa ye jila yakuhwisa milonga ize yakupwa mu umbachiso.

Kumbululo lia mu Mbimbiliya
Atu anji kakulihula hakutwala ku ulemu wa mwono mu milali yinji, ngwe chakutalilaho: Mumu liaka tuli hano? Shina mwono wami ukwete ulemu? Mbimbiliya yakusolola ngwo, ulemu wa mwono chili kupwa ni usepa ni Zambi. Tala umwenemwene umwe uze akusolola mu Mbimbiliya:
Zambi iye Sakatanga wetu. Mbimbiliya yakwamba ngwo: “Yehova iye Zambi, iye watutangile, tuli ninyenyi.”—Samu 100:3; Usolwelo 4:11.
Kuli chitela chize Zambi atangililile yuma yeswe, chino chinatale nawa hali yetu atu.—Izaia 45:18.
Zambi katutangile ni uswale mu “mu spiritu,” chino chinatele nawa ha usona wa kuzanga kunyingika ulemu wa mwono. (Mateu 5:3) Iye kanazange hanga tuhwise usona wacho.—Samu 145:16.
Twakuhwisa uswale wetu wa ku spiritu, ha kupwa masepa ja Zambi. Chipwe ngwe kupwa sepa lia Zambi chakusoloka ngwe chuma chize kuchichi kuhasa kulingiwa, hindu Mbimbiliya yakutukolweza ngwo: “Kundamenu kuli Zambi, mba iye kumakakundama kuli yenu.”—Tiangu 4:8; 2:23.
Nyi tunazange kupwa masepa ja Zambi, twatamba kutwama kulita ni upale wenyi hali yetu. Mbimbiliya yinasolola upale wacho ha mukanda wa Chilumbununyi 12:13, unambe ngwo: “Vwila woma Zambi, ni kufunga shimbi jenyi, mumu henaho hasulila milimo ya mutu.”
Kulutwe lia matangwa, mutukamona umanunuko wa upale wa Zambi hali yetu, muze makahwisa lamba ni kuhana mwono wa mutolo kuli masepa jenyi, waze akumuwayila.—Samu 37:10, 11

Yize Chisoneko chino Chinalumbunuka:
Yuma yize twakunyonga neyo yili yilemu kuli Zambi. (Jeremia 17:10) Tunanyingika ngwetu twatamba kwehuka kulinga hanji kuhanjika maliji a luchoko, alioze kuli nawa yuma yikwo yize twatamba kulinga. Kole yakuputukila mu manyonga ni mu mbunge. Kashika, twatamba kuchiza tumanyonga tweswe twa kole tuze mutuhasa kusoloka mu mbunge yetu. Nyi twalinga chocho, mutuhasa ‘kwalumuka’ ni kukumba kole.
Yize Muhasa Kulinga:
Lihengwole yena mwene ni kulikehesa cheswe hanga umone yize wakunyonga hali akwenu, chipi-chipi atu a ku munyachi hanji chifuchi cheka. Lihule ngwe: ‘Kuchi nakwamona? Shina yuma yize nakunyonga hali ayo yinakatuka ha yize ngunanyingika? Nyi hanji yinakatuka ha katonde?’ Kanda utanga hanji kutala sango, yinema hanji yiheho yize yakusolola kole ni ungulungulu.
Liji lia Zambi mulihasa kutukwasa kukumba kole mu mbunge ni mu manyonga
Hi chashi ko kuhengwola kanawa manyonga jetu ni chize twakwivwa. Alioze Liji lia Zambi mulihasa kutukwasa kusa “chinyingi ha manyonga ni kuhala cha mu mbunge.” (A-Hepreu 4:12) Kashika, nunga ni kuhengwola Mbimbiliya. Tesa yuma yize wakulilongesa ni yize wakunyonga, nawa sako tachi hanga ulinge yuma yize muyivwisa Zambi kuwaha. Liji lia Zambi mulihasa kutukwasa ‘kupupa’ kole yize yinalitanda mu manyonga ni mu mbunge yetu.—2 A-Korindu 10:4, 5.

Mumu liaka twatamba kwiwuluka kufwa cha Yesu?
Kufwa cha Yesu chili chuma chilemu chinji ku mwono wa atu
Zambi yasolola zango liene ha kutuma Mwanenyi hano hashi hanga afwile hali yetu. (1 Yoano 4: 9, 10) Yesu yalweza tumbaji jenyi hanga apwe ni kwewuluka kufwa chenyi ha chimwe chiwanyino haze hakupwa mbolo ni vinyu. Kulinga chino ha miaka yeswe yili jila ya yakusolola kuwahilila chetu ha zango lize Zambi ni Yesu alinalio hali yetu.
Aya atamba kulia mbolo ni kunwa vinyu?
Muze Yesu chitangu alwezele tumbaji jenyi hanga ewuluke kufwa chenyi, iye kambile hakutwala ku umwe usendo. (Mateu 26:26-28) Uno wazulwile jila kuli ayo ni kuli chimwe chizavu chikehe cha waze makapwa mianangana ni asasendote hamwe nenyi mu malilu. Chipwe ngwe atu anji akwiwuluka kufwa cha Yesu, waze wika ali mu usendo wacho e akulia mbolo ni kunwa vinyu.
Ha 2,000 a miaka, Yehova kakusakula waze makapwa mianangana. (Luka 12:32) Ayo kali akehe hakwatesa ni waze makatwama hano hashi ku miaka ya yeswe.

KAPOSHI WA KUTALILA N.º 3 2021 | Kuchi Muhasa Kupwa ni Mwono Upema Kulutwe lia Matangwa?
Yika muhasa kulinga hanga upwe ni mwono upema kulutwe lia matangwa? Kaposhi Wakutalila yono mahanjika ha yikuma yize muyihasa kukukwasa kupwa ni mwono upema kulutwe lia matangwa. Chikwo nawa makukwasa kunyingika yuma yize watamba kulinga mba upwe ni mwono upema kulutwe lia matangwa.
Atu anji waze akulilongesa tutongonoshi, feng shui, hanji kuwayila tulamba two waze hanafu, ni waze akufuliela ngwo mutu nyi mafwa kakusemuka nawa cheka, kakunyonga ngwo kutalatala chetu cha kulutwe lia matangwa kakuchisongwela ku tachi jize kujishi kumoneka.
Atu anji waze alilongesele chinji ku mashikola anene-anene ni kupwa ni mbongo jinji kakahashile kupwa ni yuma yize azangile kupwa nayo.
Chili chilemu kupwa mutu mupema, alioze chino kuchalumbunukine ngwo mutu atamba kulinga wika mba apwe ni mwono upema kulutwe lia matangwa.
Muze twakuzanga kukwata chimwe chiyulo, kanji-kanji twakufupa ukwaso wa mutu yoze uli mukulwana wetu hanji uli ni mana anji kuhiana yetu. Chizechene nawa mutuhasa kuwana usongwelo upema wa chize mutuhasa kupwa ni mwono upema kulutwe lia matangwa.

Kusakalala chili kuhonga ku mujimba mumu lia ponde hanji chuma chikwo. Wongo wakutuma sango ku mujimba hanga utusule hormônio jinji. Hormônio jacho yakwalumuna kukalakala cha manyinga ni kuhwima, jakuwezela kulilambila cha mbunge ni kukalisa mijipa ni misunya ya mujimba wa mutu. Shimbu kanda unyingika yize yinalingiwa haze uli, mujimba wene wakulinga yuma yino hanga ukutoweze. Muze ponde yakupalika mujimba wakuhiluka ngwe chize wapwanga ni kukalakala kanawa.

Vyuma muka navikafwa mutu apwenga chisemi wamwaza?
Nge visemi navasololanga zangi nakulivumbika mutanga, kaha navana navapwa navilinga vyamwaza. (Wavaka-Kolose 3:14, 19) Visemi vamwaza vazanga vana vavo nakuvasangejeka ngana muze Yehova Kalunga asangejekele Mwanenyi.—Tangenu Mateu 3:17.
Setu wamwilu eji kwivwililanga vyuma veji kulombanga vangamba jenyi nakuvazakama. Visemi vatela kulondezeza Yehova hakwivwililanga kuvyuma navahanjika vana vavo. (WaYakova 1:19) Vatela kwivwishisanga vyuma vali nakushinganyeka vana vavo kuhakilako vene navyuma vyakuhingama navahanjika.—Tangenu Kulava 11:11, 15.
Munahase kulela ngachilihi vana venu vapwenga navilinga vyamwaza?
Hakupwa muvisemi, mwatwama nangolo jakutunga jishimbi mutanga. (Wavaka-Efwesu 6:1) Ngocho londezezenunga chakutalilaho chaKalunga. Yehova azanga vana venyi hakuvahana jishimbi nakuvalweza ponde yeji kwizanga hakuhona kujikavangiza. (Kuputuka 3:3) Muchishishisa chakushinyinyika vatu vakavangize jishimbi jenyi, eji kuvanangulanga omwo vanahase kunganyala hakulinga vyuma vyamwaza.—Tangenu Isaya 48:18, 19.
Fwilenunga kukafwa vana venu vazange Kalunga. Echi nachivakafwa valingenga vyuma vyamwaza numba nge vali uka wavo. Ngana muze Kalunga eji kunangulanga vatu hakuvasolwela chakutalilaho chamwaza, nayenu visemi nawa mwatela kunangulanga vana venu hakuvahana chakutalilaho chamwaza.—Tangenu Lushimbi lwamuchivali 6:5-7; Wavaka-Efwesu 4:32; 5:1.

Alama naEve vasemene vana, kaha vatu vavulile hano hamavu. Kutwala muze, vangelo vamwe valikangile kuli Kalunga nakukundwiza Satana.

MBIMBILIYA kayavuluka kakweji asemukile Yesuko. Oloze yasolola vyuma navihasa kutukafwa tukukulule ngwetu kasemukile muDecemberko.
Achishinganyeke omu yapwilenga ngonde kana muMbetelema, muze asemukilile Yesu. Kakweji wavaYuleya waChislev (uze alitombola nakakweji waNovember/December) apwile hikakweji wachishika navula. Kaha kakweji akavangijileho apwile Tebeth (December/January). Kakweji kana apwilenga wachishika chikuma kaha lwola lumwe kwapwilenga nambundu hajipili. Tumone vyuma yatulweza Mbi
... 
hile kwimana hawelukako.” (Ezela 10:9, 13; Yelemiya 36:22) Echi chikiko chalingishilenga tufunga vamungalila yize kuhona kupwanga haweluka namikoko javo naufuku mukakweji waDecember!
Omu Yesu asemukile, tufunga namikoko javo vapwile muchipapa naufuku
Oloze Mbimbiliya yamba ngwayo, haufuku asemukile Yesu, tufunga vapwile muchipapa nakulama mikoko javo. Muka-kusoneka Mbimbiliya, Luka, amba ngwenyi halwola luze tufunga vapwilenga “nakutwama kuchipapa nakulama mikoko javo naufuku” kwakamwihi naMbete
...
Echi nachitwanukisa mazu aMwangana Solomone akwamba ngwenyi: “Lijina lyamwenemwene linawahe kuhambakana maji amwaza, kaha likumbi lyakufwa linawahe kuhambakana likumbi lyakusemuka.” (Muka-kwambulula 7:1) Ngocho, kacheshi chaungejiko kwijiva ngwetu Mbimbiliya yalumbununa vyuma vyavivulu hamulimo waYesu nakufwa chenyi, oloze yahanjika vyavindende kaha halwola asemukile.
